# galaxy_data_products (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `result` (Attributes List) A page of results. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--result))

<a id="nestedatt--result"></a>
### Nested Schema for `result`

Read-Only:

- `catalog` (Attributes) Catalog details (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--result--catalog))
- `contacts` (Attributes List) Data Product contacts (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--result--contacts))
- `created_by` (Attributes) Created by user. If empty then the user is inactive/deleted. (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--result--created_by))
- `created_on` (String) Creation date (read only)
- `data_product_id` (String) Data Product ID (read only)
- `default_cluster_id` (String) Default cluster ID for Data Product (read only)
- `description` (String) Long form description of Data Product (read only)
- `links` (Attributes List) Any links for this Data Product (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--result--links))
- `modified_by` (Attributes) Created by user. If empty then the user is inactive/deleted. (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--result--modified_by))
- `modified_on` (String) Modified date (read only)
- `name` (String) Data Product name (read only)
- `schema_name` (String) Name of the data product schema (read only)
- `summary` (String) Short summary of Data Product (read only)

<a id="nestedatt--result--catalog"></a>
### Nested Schema for `result.catalog`

Read-Only:

- `catalog_id` (String) Catalog Id (read only)
- `catalog_kind` (String) Kind of catalog (read only)
- `catalog_name` (String) Name of the catalog (read only)
- `local_regions` (List of String) Set of local regions for the catalog (read only)


<a id="nestedatt--result--contacts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `result.contacts`

Read-Only:

- `email` (String) User email (read only)
- `user_id` (String) User ID (read only)


<a id="nestedatt--result--created_by"></a>
### Nested Schema for `result.created_by`

Read-Only:

- `email` (String) User email (read only)
- `user_id` (String) User ID (read only)


<a id="nestedatt--result--links"></a>
### Nested Schema for `result.links`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String) The name of the link (read only)
- `uri` (String) The link URI (read only)


<a id="nestedatt--result--modified_by"></a>
### Nested Schema for `result.modified_by`

Read-Only:

- `email` (String) User email (read only)
- `user_id` (String) User ID (read only)
